typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		LoanNr_ChkDgt as string,
		Name as string,
		City as string,
		State as string,
		Zip as string,
		Bank as string,
		BankState as string,
		NAICS as integer,
		ApprovalDate as string,
		ApprovalFY as integer,
		Term as integer,
		NoEmp as integer,
		NewExist as string,
		CreateJob as integer,
		RetainedJob as integer,
		FranchiseCode as string,
		UrbanRural as string,
		RevLineCr as boolean,
		LowDoc as boolean,
		ChgOffDate as string,
		DisbursementDate as string,
		DisbursementGross as integer '$###,###',
		BalanceGross as integer '$###,###',
		MIS_Status as string,
		ChgOffPrinGr as integer '$###,###',
		GrAppv as integer '$###,###',
		SBA_Appv as integer '$###,###'
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> PullSourceData
source(output(
		DigitCode as integer,
		Industry as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> NAICS01
PullSourceData derive(IndustryCode = toInteger(NAICS/10000),
		Risk = toString(case(MIS_Status =='P I F', 'low', MIS_Status =='CHGOFF', 'high'))) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1, NAICS01 join(IndustryCode == DigitCode,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1 select(mapColumn(
		LoanNr_ChkDgt,
		Name,
		City,
		State,
		Zip,
		Bank,
		BankState,
		NAICS,
		ApprovalDate,
		ApprovalFY,
		Term,
		NoEmp,
		NewExist,
		CreateJob,
		RetainedJob,
		FranchiseCode,
		UrbanRural,
		RevLineCr,
		LowDoc,
		ChgOffDate,
		DisbursementDate,
		DisbursementGross,
		BalanceGross,
		MIS_Status,
		ChgOffPrinGr,
		GrAppv,
		SBA_Appv,
		IndustryCode,
		Risk,
		Industry
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RemoveUnnecessaryColumns
RemoveUnnecessaryColumns sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	truncate: true,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Curateddata
